1616080.name: Muv-Luv Alternative Manga Super Bundle 2
1616080.description:
The highest-rated visual novel of all time, now in manga form!
Experience the adventures of Shirogane Takeru as he fights to save humanity from the BETA.
Muv-Luv Alternative manga is huge in Japan, and we're proud to bring it to our global fans as well!

In addition to popular e-book formats like PDF, mobi, and epub, this pack also contains a special digital reader with music from the game, for a true Muv-Luv experience!

This DLC manga bundle includes Volumes 5 to 8.
Get Volumes 1-4 in Muv-Luv Alternative Manga Super Bundle 1
Get Volumes 9-12 in Muv-Luv Alternative Manga Super Bundle 3

Features

  • Read the manga by using its own Digital Reader, or by directly opening any of the available formats - PDF, MOBI, and EPUB!
  • All original artwork, amazingly drawn by Azusa Maxima!
  • Many never-seen-before content - expand your Muv-Luv experience with the perspective of other characters!
